about_the_game:
EXPERIENCE THE LIFE OF A WOLF
Create and control your own elemental wolf in a new original story.

Born on the island of Sylvanna, you are a guardian of the natural law.  Sworn to protect the ways of the ancients and the life force of Gaia. However, as you discover mankind for the first time your way of life is about to change.


THE STORY IS YOURS TO TELL

The time of tranquility has been lost, humans have landed on the shores and they are setting up camps all over the island.

Extracting the life force from Gaia and destroying natural habitats wherever they go. 

You become the force of nature that decides the success of either the human race or the natural law.

You can decide to stalk your human prey and take them down silently one by one, or use the power of the elements to destroy the encampments sprawled across the land!

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

Tale Of A Wolf is still in active development and this list is not extensive but is planned for the release.
  • Unique story with additional side quests.
  • Customise your wolf to your own design.
  • Immersive gameplay - the island lives without you!
  • Boss fights vs human military vehicles.
  • Open area to explore.
  • Wolf packs that you can either work with or against.
  • Extensive cave system, extending the playable area.
  • Use elemental magic (fire, earth, ice, water, and lightning) to eliminate your enemies.

GET READY FOR A NEW ADVENTURE

Will the humans takeover Sylvanna?

Will the native wildlife survive the expansion of mankind?

Can you obtain the elemental powers that reside on the island?

Start your journey of discovery and make unconventional friendships along the way!
